Inicio: 10/06/2007 Fim: 31/07/2008 Isabel C. de 34 anos de idade, natural de Matola , Provincia de Maputo, cresceu sob a responsabilidade da sua tia e a situação financeira da familia era razoavel, estudou ate 2 ano do ensino tecnico profissional no ramo da Quimica tendo desistido em 1989 por motivo de gravidez e apartir deste momento nao continuou mas com os estudos. Desde 1990 vem assumindo na integra a gestão de negocio da familia e possui um estabelecimento Comercial na sua casa e e fornecedora de produtos alimentares assim como vestuario para os revendedores de Boane assim como da Matola. Tem quatro (4) filhos. Por indicação da sua amiga teve conhecimento da existência da HLUVUKU ADSEMA tendo se aproximado e solicitado um emprestimo para ampliação do seu negocio.

Actualmente o seu negocio esta num ritmo razoavel e providencia emprego para ela propria e um dos filhos. com os rendimentos do negocio suporta os encargos familiares, incluindo despesas escolares de dois filhos. Com o emprestimo de 25.000,00MT pretende comprar produtos para o aumentar stock na sua loja.

A sua actividade tem um impacto maior na comunidade porque para alem de providenciar emprego a ela e seu filho, coloca o produto mas perto da comunidade em particular destaque para todas os revendedores do Distrito de Boane assim como da Matola.

loans.use: To increase stock in her shop

payments.comment: Isabel has repaid this loan ahead of time.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.pt:
Rosa M., was born and raised in Mudissa, in the Matutuine province, Maputo. She was raised by her maternal grandmother. Her family’s financial situation provided little opportunities for studying. Rosa studied until the 4th grade. Since 1990, Rosa has supported her family through her small business which expanded to 2 stores.

In 2006, Rosa was introduced to HLUVUKU ADSEMA by her neighbors and requested her first loan in order to expand her business. Since then the business has grown. Today it provides employment for 3 people. With the earnings from the business, Rosa provides for her family, and pays for the schooling of her children. Rosa was also able to open a savings account.

With the loan of 20.000,00 MT, Rosa plans to increase the stock in her business. Rosa’s work has a positive impact in her community because it provides employment for Rosa and 3 other people. It also brings basic products closer to her community especially in the neighborhood Bairro 1.

Translated from Portuguese by Mariana Komatsuzaki Fraga, Kiva Volunteer.

LOCALIZAÇÃO: Bairro 01 - Boane ACTIVIDADE: Comercio CLIENTE: Rosa Mafambame VALOR DE EMPRESTIMO: 20.000,00MT (800.00US$) APLICAÇÃO DO MONTANTE: Compra e venda de Produtos Inicio: 10/06/2007 Fim: 31/07/2008 Rosa M., Natural de Mudissa, Distrito de Matutuine, Provincia de Maputo, cresceu na responsabilidade da Avo na parte da Mae, a situacao financeira da familia criou-lhe poucas oportunidades para estudar, tendo concluido apenas 4 classe. Desde 1990 vem assumindo na integra a gestao de negocio da familia e conta hoje com dois (2) pequenos estabeleciomentos comerciais.

Apartir do ano de 2006 por indicação da vizinha teve conhecimento da existência da HLUVUKU ADSEMA tendo aproximado e solicitado o seu primeiro emprestimo para ampliacao do seu negocio. Desde entao a sua actividade conheceu outra dinamica. Actualmente o seu negocio esta num bom ritmo e providencia emprego para tres (3) pessoas. Com os rendimentos da sua actividade suporta os encargos familiares, despesas Escolares e conseguiu abrir uma conta poupança.

Com o emprestimo de 20.000,00 pretende aumentar o volume de mercadoria. A sua actividade tem impacto maior na comunidade porque alem de providenciar emprego para ela propria e tres (3) outras pessoas, coloca o produto mas perto da comunidade em particular destaque para todo pessoal do Bairro-1.

loans.use: To increase stock in her business

loans.name: Muhabat

texts.en: Muhabat has 10 years of experience trading at the market. She started her business with a limited number of goods. She is married and has four children; her mother-in-law takes care of them while she is at work. Her husband’s salary is not enough, so her earnings are the main source of family income. Her business is located at the central market and she says that it is one of the most crowded places and of course she can sell her goods in a short time. With the new season, Muhabat would like to buy a new assortment of goods and buy thinner fabric for national dresses and bedclothes. She will use her loan for these new fabrics which will be brought by her friend from China.

loans.use: Muhabat would like to increase the turnover of fabric at her textile store by buying new fabrics to sell.

loans.name: Zulfi

texts.en:
Zulfi has been engaged in the trade of childrens' clothes for over 4 years. She is married and has two daughters. She started her business 6 years ago, from the trading of leather goods in the open-air market in Khujand. The conditions of her business place were not good. Often her goods were dirty from the rain and snow, and it was very cold in winter which was not good for her health.

In 2003 she decided to change her business, so she started trading childrens' clothes. Today she is renting a place in the central shop at the Panjshanbe market. The diversity of her goods attracts more and more clients, who are left satisfied with the beautiful babies' dresses they bought from her. Zulfi’s business is successful now and that’s why she would like to rent one more place, where her daughter will be partly responsible for the business.

loans.use: Zulfi would like to increase her goods for her children's clothing store.

loans.name: Taslima

texts.en:
Taslima B. 27 years of age, wife of Md. Hyeder Ali, 35 years of age, is a member of  Suchana Mohila Somity. She has a son of 3 years. She also receives training on tailoring under AF. She is good on her works, young boys and girl learner tailoring from her. She has an experience of 12 years.

She herself prepares clothes both by taking orders. She also prepares clothes of different sizes  and sells in her own village and markets. She is doing well and wants enlarge her business. She wants to purchase raw materials like cloths, Saree, bed sheets, threads, niddle, buttam lace, etc. she is interested to purchase a sewing machine also to teach her husband so that he can help her in her works. She is in need of US $ 1,175.

loans.use: To purchase raw materials like cloths, Saree, bed sheets, threads, niddle etc.

loans.name: Rustamjon

texts.en:
Rustamjon has over 12 years of experience in trade. He is married and has two daughters. He started his business by selling national dresses, bedclothes and head kerchiefs which were sewn by his wife and daughters. Gradually he was able to increase the turnover of his goods. So he bought an ice cream freezer and rented one more trading place for the summer season for his younger daughter to run. They are a very friendly family and help each other in business.

Today Rustamjon’s little shop has become one of the most well-known shops in the Panjshanbe market and he has a lot of clients. He always takes his customers' needs into consideration and modifies the goods he sells accordingly. He additionally started to bring modern goods from Tashkent, Usbekistan and Bishkek, Kirgisistan. Now he needs $1200USD to buy summer goods from these countries. P.S. There is Rustamjon's wife on the photo.

loans.use: Rustamjon would like to increase his business where he sells bedclothes, kerchiefs and dresses sewn by his wife and daughters.

loans.name: Rustam

texts.en: Rustam has been engaged in business for over 10 years. He is married and has two children. He has a university degree and is a geography teacher. But the salary of a teacher was not enough to support his family and he decided to trade womens' clothes. In 1997 Rustam rented a little place for his activity. He started his business from $100USD and step-by-step he was able to increase the turnover of his goods to $100USD. Today he has many constant clients. His wife helps him in his activity. She sells his goods when he goes on the trip to purchase the next batch of goods. In the future he plans to rent one more place for his wife and of course he wants to expand his assortment to attract new clients.

loans.use: Rustam is an ex-geography teacher who would like to expand his womens' clothing store.

loans.name: Zeby

texts.en:
Zeby S. has a small sewing shop in Khujand. She is married and has three sons. She lives with her parents-in-law who are pensioners and are under her guardianship. She has a university degree and is a designer of womens' clothes. She opened her sewing shop in 2001 and had only two sewing machines in it. She worked every day, without days off. When she heard about MicroInvest she became a client of this organization. She always disbursed her loan in time. Today she is one of the most active clients of MicroInvest. Due this organization she was able to expand her business. She bought 8 machines and employed 4 seamstresses.

Zeby has constant customers who buy her products and sell them in their shops. She also takes individual orders and tries to satisfy them. Today Zeby is one of the most famous designers in Khujand. She has clients from all districts of Khudjand and some clients from Dushanbe. In the new season, national dresses with embroidery and beads are in demand and so with this new loan for MicroInvest, Zeby wants to buy embroidery machines for her sewing shop.

loans.use: Zeby would like to purchase more sewing machines for her sewing shop.

loans.name: Leyla

texts.en: Leyla is 25 years old and is an internally displaced person (IDP) from the occupied territory of Azerbaijan, Kalbadjar region. She has settled in the Khirdalan settlement, and she is single. She is a lawyer. She has been in this glassware business for 5 years. Leyla wants to buy a lot of wares for improving her income. Now she needs a loan of $1200 to buy wares such as chandeliers for improving her business.

loans.use: To buy wares such as chandeliers

loans.name: Safron

texts.en:
Safron E. is a divorced, energetic woman who is 49 years old. She is a ballet-master of choreographic ensemble by her education. She worked as the director of the Young People's Theatre before. She is an honored artist of the Republic of Tajikistan and honorary citizen. She works part time as an instructor giving dance lessons. She decided to go into business 4 years ago, as her salary was not enough for her family. She has two children, they study at school. Nobody helps her, she brings commodities from Bishkek. She was selling on foot before, and now she has a stable business.
She is applying for $1000 USD as she wants to extend her business.

loans.use: Safron would like to purchase seasonal dresses.

loans.name: Gaby

texts.es:
Gaby's husband, like many bolivian women's, left her to fill the roles of both mother and father to her three children who are 6,7 and 2 years old. She has been working as a mechanic and has been a pioneer in this field, which is normally dominated by men. She is also a professional taxi driver, from which she derives the majority of her income to support her family.

Gaby lives in her parents' home at 15th Street of Agosto, number 2475 in the Zona Fatravi in the town El Alto.

The loan will be used to purchase a motor for her car, which she uses to transport her customers ( aTrufi). A "Trufi" is similar to a taxi service, the only difference being trufis have a pre-planned and fixed route.

This is her third loan, her timely repayments of her previous loans makes her a good candidate for another and she hopes to repair her car so that she can continue working without any problems. Her repayment history is satisfactory from her previous 18 repayments.

Translated from Spanish by Kiva Volunteer, Kristin Connor.

Gaby, como muchas mujeres bolivianas ha sido abandonada por su esposo quedando como padre y madre de sus tres hijos de 6,7 y 2 años de edad; ella ha tenido la necesidad de trabajar como mecánico y pionera en una actividad que normalmente es desempeñada por varones y tiene una movilidad que trabaja con un chofer, de donde se derivan sus ingresos principales con los que mantiene a su familia. Gaby vive en la casa de sus padres ubicada en la calle 15 de Agosto # 2475 de la Zona Fatravi en la Ciudad de El Alto. El crédito lo destinara para la compra de un motor para su movilidad, que trabaja de servicio público (Trufi).Para un mejor conocimiento un “Trufi” es muy similar a un taxi, con la única diferencia que los trufis tienen una ruta fija. Es el tercer crédito que recibe de nuestra Institución; su buen comportamiento de pago en los dos créditos anteriores le permite acceder a otro préstamo y mejorar la condición de su vehiculo para que trabaje sin problema. El análisis de su flujo de caja muestra condiciones satisfactorias para el repago del crédito en las 18 cuotas que solicita.

loans.use: To purchase a motor for her car.

loans.name: Melina

texts.es:
Melina has a mechanic's shop where she works with her husband, they do not have any employees and they make all types of repairs on motorized vehicules. Their shop and home are located in the zone Copacabana in the city La Paz. This is the fourth loan that they have applied for. Their history with our organization classifies them as a "Client 2," which means that they have regularly met their re-payment obligations. The three previous loans they applied for were all payed back in their entirety. The loan they now apply for will be used to purchase tools ( jacks, presses, and a soldering tool etc.) Their previous loans and their work make them ideal candidates for another loan, as they already have work experience and enough income to cover the re-payments.

Translated from Spanish by Kiva Volunteer, Kristin Connor.

Melina tiene un taller de mecánica donde trabaja con su esposo, no tiene empleados y realizan todo tipo de arreglos de vehículos motorizados. Su taller y domicilio se encuentra ubicado en la zona de villa Copacabana de la ciudad de La Paz. Es la Cuarta vez que solicita un crédito. Su historial en nuestra institución lo califica como cliente 2, es decir con cumplimiento regular en el pago de su obligación. Los tres préstamos anteriores fueron pagados en su totalidad. El monto solicitado será destinado para la compra de herramientas (Gatas, prensas y arco de soldar etc.) Sus antecedentes crediticios y trabajo le permiten acceder a este crédito ya que tiene experiencia en su negocio, el cual le da ingresos para cubrir el préstamo.

loans.use: To purchase tools

loans.name: Ponciano

texts.es:
Ponciano has a jewelry shop where he creates all sort of pieces in gold and silver ( earrings, rings, braceletes, necklaces etc.) He works alone in his shop and when he has many contracts to fulfill, he hires an employee who he pays based on the number of pieces he finishes. He lives in the zone Copacabana in the city La Paz and his shop can be found on the street Graneros in the Galeria Graneros in the zone Rosario, also located in La Paz. This is the fifth loan that he has applied for with IMPRO. His history with our organization classifies him as a "Client 2," which means he regularly meets repayments. The previous four loans have all been repayed in their entirety. The loan his applies for today will be used to purchase gold and silver, which are his prime working materials to create his jewelry. His previous loans and his work makes him an ideal candidate because he already has so much work experience. Ponciano has worked with IMPRO since 2004 and has demonstrated a seriousness in his work and his repayment plans.

Translated from Spanish by Kiva Volunteer, Kristin Connor.

Ponciano tiene un taller de joyería donde realiza todo tipo de trabajos en oro y plata (Aretes, Anillos, cadenas, dijes, etc.) Trabaja solo en su taller, y cuando tiene mucho trabajo contrata a un empleado a quien le paga por trabajo terminado. Vive en la zona de villa Copacabana de la ciudad de La Paz y su taller se encuentra ubicado en la calle Graneros, en la Galería Graneros de la zona el Rosario, también en la ciudad de La Paz. Es la Quinta vez que solicita un crédito con IMPRO. Su historial en nuestra institución lo califica como cliente 2, es decir con cumplimiento regular en el pago de su obligación. Los cuatro créditos anteriores han sido pagados en su totalidad. El monto solicitado será destinado para la compra de Oro y plata, que son la materia prima de su producción de joyas y otros productos. Sus antecedentes crediticios y trabajo le permiten acceder a este crédito ya que tiene experiencia en su negocio. Ponciano trabaja con IMPRO desde el año 2004 y ha demostrado seriedad tanto en su trabajo como en el pago de sus obligaciones.

loans.use: Working capital.

loans.name: Omar

texts.es:
Omar works with his wife in a salon where they do manicures, pedicures, massages and reduction treatments. He lives in the zone Miraflores, where he also sees his customers, he has one employee who he pays a percentage according to the work she does. This is the first time that he is applying for a loan with IMPRO. The loan will be used to purchase material ( porcelain, bone, nail polishes in all colors and nailpolish remover.). His work makes him a good candidate for this loan as he already has work experience, the incomes from which will be able to cover the loan, and he has no other bills to pay.

Translated from Spanish by Kiva Volunteer, Kristin Connor.

Omar trabaja con su esposa y se dedican al servicio de manicure, pedicure, masajes y tratamientos de reducción. Vive en la zona de Miraflores donde también atienden a sus clientes; tiene una empleada a quien le paga un porcentaje de acuerdo al trabajo que realiza. Es la primera vez que solicita un crédito de IMPRO. El monto solicitado será destinado para la compra de material (Porcelana, yeso, esmalte de todo color, y quita esmalte) Su trabajo le permite acceder a este crédito ya que tiene experiencia en su negocio, el cual le da ingresos para cubrir el préstamo, considerando que no tiene otras cuentas por pagar.

loans.use: To purchase work materials.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
Mrs Rosa R. has over 14 years of experience running a grocery store. "This business supports my whole family. My parents and two daughters live with me. Business is falling off because I don't have enough inventory in the store. The reason for this is that I don't have enough shelf space to display it. I'm asking for a loan of $1,200 to expand the grocery store."

Translated from Spanish by Antonio Padial, Kiva Volunteer

La Sra. Rosa R. tiene ya más de 14 años en el negocio de abarrotes. "Este negocio es el ingreso familiar, con migo viven mis papas y dos hijas que tengo, el negocio esta reducido no tengo la mercancio en bodega, porque no tengo suficiente espacio donde exhibirla. Solicito un préstamo de $1,200.00 DLLS. Para ampliar el negocio.

loans.use: Grocery store expansion

loans.name: Maria Socorro

texts.es:
I have over 11 years of experience in the cheese-making business. This business, in which my husband and children also work, is our sole source of income. With the livestock we currently have, we can't produce enough cheese to satisfy customer demand. We are asking for a loan of $1,200 to buy livestock, raw materials, and equipment so that we can expand our line of products.

Translated from Spanish by Antonio Padial, Kiva Volunteer

Tengo ya mas de 11 años en el negocio de elaboración de quesos este negocio es el ingreso de la familia en el trabajamos mis hijos, esposo y yo. El ganado que tenemos ya no es suficiente para la elaboración de los quesos cada ves tenemos mas pedidos, es por eso que estamos solicitando un préstamo de $1,200.00 Dlls. Para comprar ganado, materia prima y herramienta de trabajo para elaborar los quesos y hacer otros productos.

loans.use: Purchase of raw materials and equipment

loans.name: Saúl

texts.es:
Business Description: Mr. Saúl began his business 4 ago with his bricklayer salary. He sells everything related to locksmiths: doors, windows, gates, etc. Mr. Saúl started out with very few clients. Now, a few months later, he has clients constantly working with him.

Use of Loan: Mr. Saúl has the tools he needs to work with but not the funds to purchase material and merchandise to meet his clients’ demands nor an adequate workshop to work in.

Personal Information: He is single, his house is made of concrete and his goal is to have a bigger workshop to provide others in need a job opportunity.

Translated to English by Patricia Yáñez, Kiva Volunteer.

Descripción del Negocio: El Señor Saúl empezó su negocio hace 4 años producto de un dinero que ganaba como albañil, el vende todo lo concerniente en cerrajería tales como puertas, ventanas, rejas, etc. El Señor Saúl empezó con muy pocos clientes de los cuales con el pasar de los meses esto ha cambiado y hoy tiene clientes que siempre están trabajando con el.

Uso del Préstamo: EL Señor Saúl tiene hoy en día todas las herramientas necesarias para trabajar pero su capital no es suficiente, pues el cuenta con este crédito para poder comprar mas material y mercadería para poder atender todas las demandas de sus clientes y de esta manera poder tener sus taller mas adecuado para trabajar.

Información Personal: EL es soltero, su vivienda es de cemento y su meta es poder tener un día su taller mas grande y de esta manera dar oportunidades de trabajo a mas personas que necesitan.

loans.use: Invest in prime materials

loans.name: Soraya

texts.es:
Business Description: Mrs. Soraya began her business 8 months ago with the money her husband was able to help her with. She sells perfumery products in different areas of her neighborhood. Her and her mother also sell clothes. Today’s demands are larger than her supplies and she cannot meet them because she cannot make the necessary investment.

Use of Loan: She wants to buy merchandise to be able to sell her products at home instead of wandering; she has a 11-month-old boy which makes it difficult to do so.

Personal Information: She is 22 years old; she is married and has an eleven-month-old child. Her house is made of cane and her goal with this loan is to increase her merchandise. In the future, she would like to set up a store in the central area of the city.

Translated to English by Patricia Yáñez, Kiva Volunteer.

Descripción del Negocio: La señora Soraya empezó su negocio hace 8 meses con un dinero que el esposo le pudo ayudar, la señora vende productos de perfumería en diferentes sectores de su barrio y juntamente con su mama también le ayuda a la venta de ropa, en la actualidad tiene mas pedidos pero no lo es posible suplir la necesidad de sus clientes ya que no tiene el capital necesario .

Uso del Préstamo: Ella quiere comprar mercadería para poder tener en su propia casa la venta de todos los productos que hoy vende en la calle ya que tiene un niño de 11 meses y se le dificulta sus recorridos regulares .

Información Personal: Ella tiene 22 años y es casada, tiene un niño de 11 meses, su vivienda es de caña, la meta que ella tiene es que con este crédito poder crecer su mercadería ya que en un futuro quiere instalar un bazar en una zona céntrica de la ciudad.

loans.use: Adjust her home to use as sales point for her merchandise

loans.name: Norma

texts.es:
Business Description: Mrs. N. began her business 9 months ago with the money her husband was able to save. Today, her store has grown and sells products in need. It is located in a high-transit location and she has progressed.

Use of Loan: She will use the credit to make improvements to her store and buy more merchandise in order to have a larger variety. This way she will provide a better service to her clients.

Personal Information: She is 24 years old and has 2 children. They live in a home that is made of cane which is located right next to her store. She works in the business with her husband, has a stable family situation and her goal is to have a big product store in the area.

Translated to English by Patricia Yáñez, Kiva Volunteer.

Descripción del Negocio: La Señora empezó su negocio hace 9 meses con un dinero que el esposo pudo ahorrar, hoy en día su tienda ha crecido y vende todos los productos de primera necesidad, su ubicación es un lugar muy transitado y ella ha progresado.

Uso del Préstamo: Ella va a usar su crédito para adecuar el local y comprar mas mercadería para poder tener en su local mas surtido y de esta manera brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes.

Información Personal: Tiene 24 años y 2 hijos su vivienda es de caña junto a su negocio, ella trabaja en el negocio con su esposo, tiene una estabilidad familiar buena y su meta es tener un local de productos grandes en el sector

loans.use: Purchase more merchandise

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
Maria is 52 years old. She is married and has 6 children, but she takes care of just one now. She is an artisan, making tablecloths and napkins which she later embroiders. She sells them to local shops and in the artisan's market in San Cristobal. She belongs to the group Rosas 2. She will use her loan to buy embroidery thread and materials to make more products and thereby increase her output.

Translated by Bianca Vargas, Kiva Volunteer.

MARIA TIENE 52 AÑOS , CASADA TIENE 6 HIJOS PERO ACTUALMENTE SOLO UNO DE ELLOS ESTA BAJO SU CARGO , ELLA SE DEDICA A LA ARTESANIA , CONFECCIONANDO MANTELES , SERVILLETAS Y BORDANDO SUS PRODUCTOS , POSTERIORMENTE LOS VENDE A PERSONAS QUE TIENEN LOCALES ESTABLECIDOS EN EL MERCADO ARTESANAL DE SAN CRISTOBAL.. PERTENECE AL GRUPO ROSAS 2.SU PRESTAMO LO VA A INVERTIR EN COMPRAR MAS HILOS PARA BORDAR Y GENEROS PARA CONFECCIONAR MAS PRENDAS Y ASI AUMENTAR LA PRODUCCION DE SUS TRABAJOS

loans.use: Craft sales

loans.name: Maria Victoria

texts.es:
Maria is 21 years old and single. She lives with her mother and she works in the production of tablecloths, napkins and other embroidered products. She and her mother don't have their own shop, so they sell their crafts to wholesalers who in turn sell to the Santo Domingo artisan's market. She also sells special orders to people in the community. With this loan, she hopes to buy more thread and fabric to increase production and sell in a small shop that is frequented by tourists.

Translated by Bianca Vargas, Kiva Volunteer.

MARIA VICTORIA TIENE 21 AÑOS ES SOLTERA JUNTO CON SU MAMA SE DEDICA A LA CONFECCION DE MANTELES, SERVILLETAS Y PIEZAS DE BORDADO ARTESANAL, NO TIENEN LOCAL PROPIO POR LO TANTO VENDE SUS PRODUCTOS A MAYORISTAS QUE VENDEN EN EL MERCADO DE SANTO DOM INGO( MERCADO ARTESANAL DE LA CIUDAD ) Y TAMBIEN VENDE A PERSONAS DE SU COMUNIDAD A PEDIDO .ESPERAN CON EL PRESTAMO CON SU MAMA COMPRAR MAS HILOS Y TELAS PARA AUMENTAR SU PRODUCCION Y PODER INSTALARSE ELLAS CON UN PEQUEÑO LOCAL DE VENTA EN SU COMUNIDAD LUGAR MUY VISITADO POR TURISTAS.

loans.use: Craft sales

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
Juana is 55 years old, married with 8 children, 2 of whom have married and no longer live at home. Her husband sells flowers in San Cristobal and also to other customers who know the region and like roses. Juana is an artisan in the production of shawls, blankets, tablecloths and napkins, all hand embroidered. She belongs to the Rosas 2 group along with Mrs. Rosa P. Jimenez who also makes embroidered tablecloths and napkins. Together, they hope to use the loan to buy great quantities of fabric and thread and share them to bring down the costs of materials and thereby increase their incomes.

Translated by Bianca Vargas, Kiva Volunteer.

JUANA TIENE 55 AÑOS , CASADA , TIENE 8 HIJOS DE LOS CUALES DOS DE ELLOS YA SE CASARON Y NO ESTAN CON ELLA .SU ESPOSO VENDE FLORES EN LA CIUDAD DE SAN CRISTOBAL Y TAMBIEN CON PERSONAS QUE CONOCEN LA REGION Y QUE GUSTAN DEL CULTIVO DE LAS ROSAS .JUANA SE DEDICA A LA ARTESANIA CONFECCIONANDO CHALES , MANTAS , MANTELES , SERVILLETAS TODAS CON APLICACIONES DE BORDADOS ARTESANALES. PERTENECE AL GRUPO ROSAS 2 JUNTO CON DOÑA ROSA P. JIMENEZ LA CUAL TAMBIEN SE DEDICA A LA ARTESANIA CONFECCIONANDO MANTELES Y SERVILLETAS BORDADAS.JUNTAS ESPERAN CON EL PRESTAMO COMPRAR GRANDES CANTIDADES DE GENERO , HILOS Y REPARTIRSE ENTRE ELLAS PARA ASI REBAJAR LOS COSTOS DE COMPRA Y AUMENTAR SUS INGRESOS .

loans.use: Craft sales
